author: Claudia D
title: Bad experience with the front desk
text: So I have stayed at this hotel for at least 6 times plus recommend it to lots of friends, but last time I was there when I was trying to check in the lady who was attending me said that they couldn't find my reservation which I made online and paid already then she pointed at a chair and left without saying a word I waited there for about 20 mins when I decided to go ask for her again then to my surprise she was doing something else and just said to me we do not have your reservation on the system and looked at me like: so that's it, so I end up talking to someone else and after an hour and 20 mins they gave me an "up graded" room which was really big and comfy bed, but the bathroom was really old with really low pressure in the shower not to mention the ongoing change for cold-warm-really hot water cycle while you are showering, I felt they try to sell me the idea of an upgraded room but really just stuck me in a old room so I stop asking for my reservation which they lost somehow. I know mistakes can happen but to have to fight with the front desk for a room once you just arrived, suitcases and all and wait for and 1 hour and half just to get a stop complaining room the other 5 times I've stayed I had really good experiences but this last time it's really making me reconsider if I will ever stay here again nor will I recommend it
